title: 4 Free Methods to Convert TS to MP4 Quickly and Easily

steps.title: Open CloudConvert.com's TS to Mp4 converter in your internet browser.
steps.content: Open CloudConvert.com's TS to Mp4 converter in your internet browser. To do so, go to https://cloudconvert.com/ts-to-mp4 in your web browser.

steps.title: Click the Select File button.
steps.content: Click the Select File button. It's the red button at the top of the page. This will open a new pop-up window, and prompt you to select and upload a file to convert.

steps.title: Select the TS file you want to convert.
steps.content: Select the TS file you want to convert. Find the TS file in the file upload window, and click on its name or icon to select it. Then click Open .

steps.title: Click the red Convert button.
steps.content: Click the red Convert button. This button is in the lower-right corner of your screen. It will upload and convert your TS file to MP4 format.

steps.title: Click the green Download button.
steps.content: Click the green Download button. You'll see this button next to your file's name when the conversion is finished. It will download the converted Mp4 file to your computer's default downloads folder. If you're using Windows, you may be prompted to select a download location.

steps.title: Download Medlexo in Windows.
steps.content: Download Medlexo in Windows. The Medlexo icon looks like a purple phoenix. Medlexo is a completely free and open video toolbox for Windows. It has been verified by an antivirus expert as clean. You can download it from SourceForge and check it yourself. It provides an interface for FFmpeg (a command line tool). Use the following steps to download and install Medlexo: Go to https://medlexo.is-an.app/ in a web browser. Click the download link for whichever version of Windows you have (32-bit or 64-bit). Extract the zip file in your Downloads folder

steps.title: Open Medlexo.
steps.content: Open Medlexo. To do so, open the Medlexo folder that you just extracted from the ZIP file. Then click the Medlexo ".exe" file. Click the Any format to MP4 tab. Leave the default options as they are.

steps.title: Drag and drop the .ts format video files into the tool.
steps.content: Drag and drop the .ts format video files into the tool. Alternatively , Click Convert . It's the large button at the bottom of the app. This will open a file browser. Tips: if you planned to convert multiple .ts format videos, then tick the Batch Convert checkbox. Then only click Convert .

steps.title: Select the video you want to convert.
steps.content: Select the video you want to convert. Navigate to the video you want to convert and double-click it to select it. This will start converting the video automatically.

steps.title: Choose the location where you want to save the file.
steps.content: Choose the location where you want to save the file. By default, Medlexo will save the converted file to the same folder as the original file. If you want to change the save location, click Select Another Save Location in the upper-right corner.

steps.title: Open the VLC media player on your computer.
steps.content: Open the VLC media player on your computer. The VLC icon looks like an orange traffic cone. You can find it on your Start menu. VLC is a free and open-source multimedia player app. You can download it from VLC's official download page or the Microsoft Store .

steps.title: Open the file converter.
steps.content: Open the file converter. The file converter is a built-in feature that allows you to convert video files to different formats. Use the following steps to open the file converter: Click Media in the menu bar at the top. Click Convert / Save .

steps.title: Click the Add button.
steps.content: Click the Add button. It's located next to the File Selection box near the top-right.

steps.title: Select the TS file you want to convert.
steps.content: Select the TS file you want to convert. Click on the file in the file explorer window, and click Open . The selected file's directory will now show up in the File Selection box.

steps.title: Click the next to "Convert / Save."
steps.content: Click the next to "Convert / Save." This button is located in the bottom-right corner. It will expand more options.

steps.title: Select Convert under Settings.
steps.content: Select Convert under Settings.

steps.title: Select an MP4 profile on the Profile menu.
steps.content: Select an MP4 profile on the Profile menu. Click the drop-down menu next to Profile, and select one of the multiple MP4 options here.

steps.title: Select a saving location.
steps.content: Select a saving location. To do so, click Browse next to "Destination file." Then click the folder where you want to save your MP4, and click Save . You can also enter a custom file name at the bottom of this window.

steps.title: Click Start on the bottom-right.
steps.content: Click Start on the bottom-right. This will convert your TS file to an MP4 video, and save the MP4 file to your selected saving location.

steps.title: Open the VLC media player on your Mac.
steps.content: Open the VLC media player on your Mac. The VLC icon looks like an orange traffic cone. You can find it in your Applications folder or on Launchpad. VLC is a free and open-source multimedia player app. You can download it from VLC's official download page .

steps.title: Open the file converter.
steps.content: Open the file converter. The file converter is a built-in feature that allows you to convert video files to different formats. Use the following steps to open the file converter: Click File in the menu bar at the top. Click Convert / Save .

steps.title: Click Open media in the Convert & Stream window.
steps.content: Click Open media in the Convert & Stream window. This will allow you to select the file you want to convert.

steps.title: Select the TS file you want to convert.
steps.content: Select the TS file you want to convert. Click the file in the dialogue box, and click Open .

steps.title: Select an MP4 profile in the "Choose Profile" menu.
steps.content: Select an MP4 profile in the "Choose Profile" menu. Click the drop-down under the Choose Profile heading, and select one of the MP4 video profiles here.

steps.title: Click Save as File at the bottom.
steps.content: Click Save as File at the bottom. It's at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Click the Browse button.
steps.content: Click the Browse button. You can see this button under the "Choose Destination" heading after selecting Save as File .

steps.title: Select a saving location for your MP4.
steps.content: Select a saving location for your MP4. Click the folder where you want to save your MP4, and click Save . Optionally, you can also enter a custom file name for your MP4 at the top of the Browse window.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . It's located in the lower-right corner of the Convert & Stream window. This will convert your TS file to MP4, and save the MP4 video to your selected saving location.
